text: 7.58: Lo 13.9; Ru 4.29; FG 6.13-14; 22.20; Hi 13.12Mbe ana suirav, ŋkɨɨr ana segɨrim, ana rimgir zav ana ndigap mba ŋgu bakɨme thav kɨrar hɨgi. Mbe kɨrar hegap fharav fhura shɨshɨga bunin ana si. Mbe bunin ana segap, mbaram wari won shagi mpeeiŋ zorgiap, nta ndim guman kama mbe nɨma suegi. Mba guman kama zɨ khare, Sor. 7.58 Isrerin tɨv khaŋ muuŋgi, guma tɨva mbatɨga guara thueŋra muuŋgirga, mbe mba guma ndigip, ŋgu bakɨme thav kɨrar hɨgɨp, ŋkɨɨar ana segɨrim, ana rimgirga. Ndu kha gava ganɨri, mba gap khare. Wok Pris 24.13 ganɨ ŋgɨp 16 tɨgɨri.
